full_text: 3RS50n P PINDIAS HIGHOURI PRIRT HEART GREEN GREATH THREE RUPEES FIFTY NAYE PAISE AIR 3. HIRA I, Mr.Chhotubhai Girjashanker Bhatt, Principal, Shri ARY Narayan Vidyalaya, Baroda, India residing at Bajwada, Dholikui, NOTARIAL Baroda, born on 5th day of February One Thousand Nine Hundred Seven (5-2-1907) at Baroda in India, hereby affirm on oath in that Dr. .Manibhai S. Patel has been intimately known to me as a A former colleague and later as a friend since 1932, that his first wife Mrs. Kamalaben M. Patel died on April 28, 1942 and LS that he got married to his present wife, Mrs. Champaben M.Patel, VOITA RY December 14, 1942. I make this statement from my personal D? experience based on the fact that I attended the funeral and cremation of Mrs. Kamalaben M. Patel and the wedding ceremony SHE Dr. Manibhai S. Patel to Mrs. Champaben M. Patel. BARODA also personally know and solemnly affirm that the said BROACH Dr. Mandbhai S. Patel has a son named Parimal by his first wife, KAITA PANCHMAHAL aben, and another son named Anupam and a daughter named DISTRICTS abarna, by his present wife, Champaben. GUJARAT STATE Chholiibhai G.Bhat NOTARY (CHHOTUBHAI G. BHATT) Subscribed and sworn (affirmed) before this 29 th day of December, A.D. 1971 at BARODA, India. Solemnly indentified affirmed before me by ohii Chhorobhai Girgashanka ohalt. who is by Advocate whom I personally know. Dt. 29-12-71 LL. higherns NOTARY 29-12-71.
